{"id":889151459,"question_id":50,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 year, 4 months","timestamp":1675222777,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/889151459/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Pow(x, n)","memory":"41.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public double myPow(double x, int n) {\n        if(n == 0)\n            return 1;\n        \n        if(n == Integer.MIN_VALUE){  // to avoid Integer overflow\n            x = x * x;\n            n = n/2;\n        }\n        \n        \n        if(n<0){\n            n = -n;\n            x = 1/x;\n        }\n        return (n%2 == 0) ?myPow(x*x, n/2) : x*myPow(x*x, n/2);\n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"powx-n","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
